data.lyric:
[ti:Goodbyes (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone/Young Thug]
[al:Goodbyes (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Goodbyes (Explicit) - Post Malone/Young Thug
[00:00.38]Lyrics by：Louis Bell/Brian Lee/Austin Post/Billy Walsh/Jeffery Williams/Jessie Lauren Foutz/Val Blavatnik
[00:00.76]Composed by：Louis Bell/Brian Lee/Austin Post/Billy Walsh/Jeffery Williams/Jessie Lauren Foutz/Val Blavatnik
[00:01.15]Post Malone：
[00:15.53]Me and Kurt feel the same too much pleasure is pain
[00:18.49]My girl spites me in vain all I do is complain
[00:21.92]She needs something to change need to take off the e-e-edge
[00:26.13]So f**k it all tonight
[00:28.96]And don't tell me to shut up
[00:32.16]When you know you talk too much
[00:35.26]But you don't got s**t to say-ay-ay
[00:39.31]Say
[00:39.49]I want you out of my head
[00:42.54]I want you out of my bedroom tonight
[00:45.86]Bedroom
[00:46.19]There's no way I could save you
[00:48.61]Save you
[00:49.04]'Cause I need to be saved too
[00:52.33]I'm no good at goodbyes
[00:53.90]We're both actin' insane but too stubborn to change
[00:57.21]Now I'm drinkin' again 80 proof in my veins
[01:00.19]And my fingertips stained looking over the e-e-edge
[01:04.33]Don't f**k with me tonight
[01:06.63]Say you needed this heart then you got it
[01:09.46]Got it
[01:09.84]Turns out that it wasn't what you wanted
[01:12.78]Wanted
[01:13.14]And we wouldn't let go and we lost it
[01:16.11]Now I'm a goner
[01:17.80]I want you out of my head
[01:20.55]Head
[01:21.00]I want you out of my bedroom tonight
[01:23.98]Bedroom
[01:24.27]There's no way I could save you
[01:26.93]Save you
[01:27.44]'Cause I need to be saved too
[01:30.15]Saved too
[01:30.68]I'm no good at goodbyes
[01:32.11]Young Thug：
[01:32.44]I want you right in my life
[01:33.89]I want you back here tonight
[01:35.51]I'm tryna cut you no knife
[01:37.13]I wanna slice you and dice you
[01:38.96]My heart get possessive it got you precise
[01:42.12]Can you not turn off the TV I'm watchin' the fight
[01:45.29]My flooded Girard blue diamond on shock
[01:48.66]You poppin' life doll it's Nicki Minaj
[01:51.82]You don't need a key to drive your car on a charger
[01:55.06]I just wanna see the side the one that's unbothered
[01:58.22]And I don't want ya to never go outside
[02:00.86]Outside
[02:01.43]I promise if they play my n***as slidin'
[02:03.99]Slidin'
[02:04.46]I'm f**kin' in it too but still ridin'
[02:07.18]Ridin'
[02:07.73]
[02:08.35]Yeah yeah yeah yeah yeah
[02:09.20]Post Malone：
[02:09.48]I want you out of my head
[02:12.03]I want you out of my bedroom tonight
[02:15.47]There's no way I could save you
[02:18.17]Save you
[02:18.85]'Cause I need to be saved too
[02:21.45]Saved too
[02:21.83]I'm no good at goodbyes
[02:24.33]Post Malone/Young Thug：
[02:24.43]Goodbye goodbye goodbye
[02:27.49]Goodbye goodbye goodbye
[02:30.64]Goodbye goodbye goodbye
[02:34.84]I'm no good at goodbyes
[02:37.37]Goodbye goodbye goodbye
[02:40.30]Goodbye goodbye goodbye
[02:43.43]Goodbye goodbye goodbye
[02:47.56]I'm no good at goodbyes
data.trans:
[ti:Goodbyes (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone/Young Thug]
[al:Goodbyes (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.38]//
[00:00.76]//
[00:01.15]//
[00:15.53]我和Kurt Cobain有一样的感觉 太快乐 反而觉得痛苦
[00:18.49]我的女朋友无缘无故嫌弃我 我只能满腹牢骚
[00:21.92]她想要改变什么 想要一醉方休
[00:26.13]所以今晚什么都别顾
[00:28.96]不要叫我停下来
[00:32.16]你知道你话太多了
[00:35.26]但你也无话可说
[00:39.31]说
[00:39.49]我想要你别再烦扰我的心
[00:42.54]今晚我不想要你进我的房间
[00:45.86]房间
[00:46.19]我不可能救你
[00:48.61]救你
[00:49.04]因为我也自身难保
[00:52.33]我不擅长道别
[00:53.90]我俩的举止都太疯狂 但又太过固执 不愿改变
[00:57.21]现在我又开始酗酒 烂醉如泥
[01:00.19]我的双手沾满了污迹 濒临崩溃
[01:04.33]今晚别来烦扰我
[01:06.63]你说你需要我的心 我毫不犹豫给了你
[01:09.46]给了你
[01:09.84]结果那并不是你想要的
[01:12.78]想要的
[01:13.14]我们不愿放手 失去了所有
[01:16.11]现在我已无可救药
[01:17.80]我想要你别再烦扰我的心
[01:20.55]我的心
[01:21.00]今晚我不想要你进我的房间
[01:23.98]房间
[01:24.27]我不可能救你
[01:26.93]救你
[01:27.44]因为我也自身难保
[01:30.15]自身难保
[01:30.68]我不擅长道别
[01:32.11]//
[01:32.44]我想要你留在我的生命里
[01:33.89]我想要你今晚回到我身边
[01:35.51]我想伤害你 不用刀
[01:37.13]我想把你伤得体无完肤
[01:38.96]我只想霸占你 独享你 绝不放开你
[01:42.12]你能不能别关电视 我正在看格斗赛呢
[01:45.29]我的吉拉德手表镶着巨大的蓝宝石
[01:48.66]你过着奢华的生活 就像Nicki Minaj
[01:51.82]你开车不用钥匙 你的车在充电
[01:55.06]我只想换个角度看问题 不受别人干扰
[01:58.22]我不希望你一直不出门
[02:00.86]出门
[02:01.43]我保证 如果他们胡来 我的兄弟绝不罢休
[02:03.99]不罢休
[02:04.46]我也一样 但依然冷静
[02:07.18]冷静
[02:07.73]
[02:08.35]//
[02:09.20]//
[02:09.48]我想要你别再烦扰我的心
[02:12.03]今晚我不想要你进我的房间
[02:15.47]我不可能救你
[02:18.17]救你
[02:18.85]因为我也自身难保
[02:21.45]自身难保
[02:21.83]我不擅长道别
[02:24.33]//
[02:24.43]道别 告别 再见
[02:27.49]道别 告别 再见
[02:30.64]道别 告别 再见
[02:34.84]我不擅长告别
[02:37.37]道别 告别 再见
[02:40.30]道别 告别 再见
[02:43.43]道别 告别 再见
[02:47.56]我不擅长告别
